description: This course shares the craft and the art of creating stories of ethical and aesthetic significance for generating and structuring audiovisual works. In this script a proposal will be designed for an audiovisual dramatic structure, with the core elements of narrative fiction. About of course. The poets of yesterday, are the writers and playwrights of today, that is why the tradition of poetic or art of creating needs to be shared to form in the office to create stories of ethical and aesthetic significance, people who aspire to generate and structure stories that once will be transformed into audiovisual works. This course is aimed at people who are part of the interdisciplinary work of production, as writers, directors, producers and people involved in this activity who wish to venture into the creation dramatic proposals on audiovisual works.
title: CCT-101: La dramática en el audiovisual de ficción
instructors: Pilar Córdoba Moon and Josefina Magaña Guiza
